Text: Despite what thepiratebay says there actually are 2-3 seeds and also some leechers. So don't be afraid to start downloading. Great quality btw
Okay, it was updated while I was writing the comment^^

Just because no-one is downloading... i know that piratebay shows, that there are no seeders (at least it does so most of the time), which isn`t true. I always seed with ~80kb/S (which isn`t much but the best i`ve got), and sometimes a friend of mine also seeds. So don`t be afraid to download this torrent.

Oh and: SEED BACK!

i will be on vacation until 12.09.2011.
so i cant seed during this time (and i doubt that there are other seeder). so sorry but you will have to wait until i am back from holiday.
but, i will seeding again, and i am also going to upload the second season. CU
